All originals certificate and 2 sets of xerox copies like:
 1.TS EAcardMCET Rank
 2.TS EAMCET Hall ticket
 3.Intermediate memo of marks cum pass certificate
 4.S.S.C or its equivalent marks memo
 5.IV to Inter study certificates
 6.Residence Certificate(in case where the candidate has no institutionalized education
 7.Residence Certificate of either of the parents in T.S. for 10 years in case of non-local candidate
 8.income certficate if applicable
 9.Aadhar Card
 10.Cast Certificate if applicable/n
